Water pump Project
#providing features:
1.amount_tsh              = Total static head (amount water available to waterpoint) = float64 = 0
2.date_recorded           = The date the row was entered = object = 0
3.funder                  = Who funded the well = object = 3637
4.gps_height              = Altitude of the well = int64 = 0
5.installer               = Organization that installed the well = object = 3655 
6.longitude               = GPS coordinate = float64 = 0
7.latitude                = GPS coordinate = float64 = 0
8.wpt_name                = Name of the waterpoint if there is one = object = 2
9.num_private             =   = int64 = 0
10.basin                  = Geographic water basin = object = 0 
11.subvillage             = Geographic location = object = 371
12.region                 = Geographic location = object = 0
13.region_code            = Geographic location (coded) = int64 = 0 
14.district_code          = Geographic location (coded) = int64 = 0
15.lga                    = Geographic location = object = 0
16.ward                   = Geographic location = object = 0
17.population             = Population around the well = int64 = 0 
18.public_meeting         = True/False = object = 3334
19.recorded_by            = Group entering this row of data = object = 0
20.scheme_management      = Who operates the waterpoint = object = 3878
21.scheme_name            = Who operates the waterpoint = object = 28810 = suggest for drop
22.permit                 = If the waterpoint is permitted = object = 3056
23.construction_year      = Year the waterpoint was constructed = int64 = 0
24.extraction_type        = The kind of extraction the waterpoint uses = object = 0
25.extraction_type_group  = The kind of extraction the waterpoint uses = object = 0
26.extraction_type_class  =The kind of extraction the waterpoint uses = object = 0
27.management             = How the waterpoint is managed = object = 0
29.management_group       = How the waterpoint is managed = object = 0
30.payment                = What the water costs = object = 0
31.payment_type           = What the water costs = object = 0
32.water_quality          = The quality of the water = object = 0
33.quality_group          = The quality of the water = object = 0
34.quantity               = The quantity of water = object = 0
35.quantity_group         = The quantity of water = object = 0
36.source                 = The source of the water = object = 0
37.source_type            = The source of the water = object = 0
38.source_class           = The source of the water = object = 0
39.waterpoint_type        = The kind of waterpoint = object = 0
40.waterpoint_type_group  = The kind of waterpoint = object = 0

#The labels in this dataset
functional                = the waterpoint is operational and there are no repairs needed
functional needs repair   = the waterpoint is operational, but needs repairs
non functional            = the waterpoint is not operational
